author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-3884.  Fix so that Eclipse plugin builds against recent Eclipse releases.

author: cmchen
msg: Two changes to the BMP format handling.
Fixed a regression around flushing the bit buffer when writing BMPs with very small palettes.
Removed assumption about DataBuffer type when reading BMPs.

author: cmlenz
msg: Experimental tabbed interface in Futon document view to switch between tabular fields display and a raw JSON display.

author: jdcasey
msg: make sure configuration of things like properties sets (which for some reason don't use the expression evaluator to resolve their values) are interpolated before delegating to the configurator.

author: cmchen
msg: Three changes to the Gif format handling.
When writing a GIF, we now always include a Graphic Control Extension block, even if its not necessary.
We are more defensive about missing GCEs.
Lastly, we now set a minimum bound on initial code sizes for LZW-compressed gif image data.
